The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 03 January is 2,286,803 (4,062.8 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 29 December, there were 268,433 new confirmed cases (476.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 22 December, there were 225,389 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 19% (43,044 extra cases).
